mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_file(file_gseq, file_origial, file_upname) VALUES (#{file_gseq}, #{file_origial}, #{file_upname} )
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tbl_file( file_seq BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, file_gseq BIGINT NOT NULL , file_original VARCHAR(125) NOT NULL , file_upname VARCHAR(125) NOT NULL )
